# The `OMPContext.h` File Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

This file provides helper functions and classes to deal with OpenMP contexts as used by <code>&#91;begin/end&#93; declare variant</code> and <code>metadirective</code>. <a href="#details">More...</a>

<MembersIndexItem
  type="struct"
  name={<><a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/omp/ompcontext">OMPContext</a></>}>
The context for a source location is made up of active property traits, e.g., device=&#123;kind(host)&#125;, and constructs traits which describe the nesting in OpenMP constructs at the location. <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/omp/ompcontext/#details">More...</a>
</MembersIndexItem>

## Description {#details}

This file provides helper functions and classes to deal with OpenMP contexts as used by <code>&#91;begin/end&#93; declare variant</code> and <code>metadirective</code>.

<Link id="l00116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="116"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Variant match information describes the required traits and how they are</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="117"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// scored (via the ScoresMap). In addition, the required consturct nesting is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00118" /><CodeLine lineNumber="118"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// decribed as well.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00119" /><CodeLine lineNumber="119" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/omp/variantmatchinfo"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">struct </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/omp/variantmatchinfo">VariantMatchInfo</a> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00120" /><CodeLine lineNumber="120"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Add the trait \\p Property to the required trait set. \\p RawString is the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00121" /><CodeLine lineNumber="121"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// string we parsed and derived \\p Property from. If \\p Score is not null, it</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00122" /><CodeLine lineNumber="122"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// recorded as well. If \\p Property is in the &#96;construct&#96; set it is recorded</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00123" /><CodeLine lineNumber="123"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// in-order in the ConstructTraits as well.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00124" /><CodeLine lineNumber="124" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/omp/variantmatchinfo/#a33a4b99974af9aad9644042639286bf3"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/omp/variantmatchinfo/#a33a4b99974af9aad9644042639286bf3">addTrait</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/omp/#aed19c754b6dc51a7f084d621b4043788">TraitProperty</a> Property, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> RawString,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00125" /><CodeLine lineNumber="125"><span class="doxyHighlight">                <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint">APInt</a> &#42;Score = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00126" /><CodeLine lineNumber="126"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/omp/variantmatchinfo/#a33a4b99974af9aad9644042639286bf3">addTrait</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/omp/#a6ab910ced9f2e14f0c3b7a176ab5fe45">getOpenMPContextTraitSetForProperty</a>(Property), Property, RawString,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00127" /><CodeLine lineNumber="127"><span class="doxyHighlight">             Score);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00129" /><CodeLine lineNumber="129"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Add the trait \\p Property which is in set \\p Set to the required trait</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00130" /><CodeLine lineNumber="130"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// set. \\p RawString is the string we parsed and derived \\p Property from. If</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00131" /><CodeLine lineNumber="131"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\p Score is not null, it recorded as well. If \\p Set is the &#96;construct&#96;</span></CodeLine>
